biotools.summary: PiSCES (Pi(scine) stream community estimation system) predicts a fish assemblage for any stream in the conterminous United States by referencing HUC-based distributional information for over 1,000 native and non-native species obtained from NatureServe, the USGS and the Peterson Field Guide to Freshwater Fishes of North America.

bioschemas.name: PiSCES
bioschemas.summary: PiSCES (Pi(scine) stream community estimation system) predicts a fish assemblage for any stream in the conterminous United States by referencing HUC-based distributional information for over 1,000 native and non-native species obtained from NatureServe, the USGS and the Peterson Field Guide to Freshwater Fishes of North America.
